definition: to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally

sentences.english: This cuts the TDP of the chip to 65W.
sentences.chinese: 这降低芯片的功耗为65瓦。

sentences.english: Single Supply, Low-Power, High Output, Current Feedback Amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 单电源，低功耗，高输出电流反馈放大器。

sentences.english: A method of gate-level power analysis based on switch variables is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于开关变量的门级功耗分析方法。

sentences.english: In addition, the design method of hardware and software of micro energy lose heat meter are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了热量表微功耗软硬件设计思想及方法。

sentences.english: Multi-voltage supply mode of processor is decided by the power need of palmtop device.
sentences.chinese: 掌上产品的功耗要求决定了处理器的多电压供电模式。

sentences.english: The hardware platform of low-power consumption is designed with the low-power consumption MCU (Microprogrammed Control Unit) as the hardware core.
sentences.chinese: 以微功耗单片机为硬件核心，设计了低功耗硬件平台。

sentences.english: The hardware platform of low-power consumption is designed with the low-power consumption MCU (Microprogrammed Control Unit) as the hardware core.
sentences.chinese: 以微功耗单片机为硬件核心，设计了低功耗硬件平台。

sentences.english: The advantages of utilizing variable step-counter are small volume and low power cost.
sentences.chinese: 其具有全数字化，体积小，功耗低和单一电源的优点。

sentences.english: ZeroG Wireless is a semiconductor company that's focused on building low-power wireless chips.
sentences.chinese: 是一家专攻小功耗无线芯片的半导体公司。

sentences.english: Low Power Low Offset Voltage Dual Comparators .
sentences.chinese: 低功耗，低失调，双路电压比较器。

sentences.english: It is also shown that the PP-pipeline reduces the clock tree power consumption of pipelined circuits.
sentences.chinese: 流水线还可以降低流水线电路的时钟树功耗。
四路，单电源，高速，低功耗比较器。

sentences.english: Analog and digital circuits with ultra-low power consumption can be widely used in many areas of applications.
sentences.chinese: 模拟与数字电路的超低功耗设计有着广泛的应用价值。

sentences.english: Low-Power, Dual, Voltage-Output, 12-Bit with Serial Interface.
sentences.chinese: 低功耗，双通道，电压输出，串行接口12位。

sentences.english: Its power dissipation and propagation delay time are a tradeoff of the two comparators.
sentences.chinese: 其功耗和传输延迟时间介于两种比较器之间。

definition: power output (of an electrical device etc)
